Text: I have this seeding on two computers with two internet connections, with a combined upload rate of 3 Mb/sec, although I do upload/download other stuff as well. I'll seed for as long as I can. :)
Do you have ALL the episodes on your harddrive?
The only ones I have on my hard drive are the ones listed here, but you can grab many others off YouTube. The quality would pretty much match the ones here :)

Oh, I was just wondering. Cause i have Season 1-4 complete.

on my harddrive.

Did you download these from Youtube?

I didnt...as I mentioned in the description, most of these came from another guy's torrent - I just added episode info and removed 5 duplicates. They were marked "WebRipz" and I can only assume that means either from YT or "grabbed" from the network's website. Feel free to make a torrent of the other episodes, cuz I'd love to see em! I got addicted to this show, cuz it's different - and I'm from Detroit :)

I have uploaded HARDCORE PAWN Season 1-3 (COMPLETE) so far.

I recommend you to download all of them.

Season 4 and 5 will be up soon
